original_text: Day after day I was with you in the temple teaching, and you did not seize me. But let the Scriptures be fulfilled.”
korean_text: 내가 날마다 너희와 함께 성전에 있으면서 가르쳤으되 너희가 나를 잡지 아니하였도다 그러나 이는 성경을 이루려 함이니라 하시더라

sentences.original_text: Day after day I was with you in the temple teaching
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 날마다 성전에서 너희와 함께 가르쳤다

sentences.original_text: and you did not seize me
But let the Scriptures be fulfilled
